meta_description: Through exhibitions, performances, art education and programs at our new, $30 million downtown campus, Oklahoma Contemporary creates opportunities to come together in celebration of contemporary culture and artistic expression. Exhibitions are always free. You are always welcome here.
hours_text:
****Admission to exhibitions is always free** — walk in while galleries are [open](https://oklahomacontemporary.org/discover/visit).**

Groups larger than 20 individuals should call 405-951-0000 or [email](mailto:eVEgroup@okcontemp.org) ahead if possible. Alternatively, group tours can be requested [here](https://oklahomacontemporary.org/learn/tours/guided-group-tour).   

**Hours of Operation**  

  * Our gallery hours are 11 a.m. to 6 p.m. Our galleries are closed on Tuesday.
  * Our store is open 11 a.m. to 6 p.m. The store is closed on Tuesdays.

* * *

**Directions**  
Approaching either direction from Broadway Avenue in Oklahoma City, you'll take NW 12th Street into our campus. (See the area [here](https://www.google.com/maps/@35.480196,-97.5134541,16z).) From there, you'll find parking lots for our main building and the Studios, or you can drop visitors or students at our main entrance.  

You can also ride the [Oklahoma City Streetcar](http://okcstreetcar.com/) to the [Arts Park stop](http://okcstreetcar.com/ride-guide/route-map/) at the intersection of NW 11th and Broadway.  

* * *

**Holiday Closures**  

  * New Year's Eve
  * New Year’s Day 
  * Martin Luther King Jr. Day
  * Memorial Day
  * Independence Day
  * Labor Day
  * Thanksgiving Day
  * Christmas Eve
  * Christmas Day 

* * *

**Oklahoma Contemporary Arts Center**  
11 NW 11th St.  
Oklahoma City, OK 73103**  
****  
****Snail Mail  
** Sending us something in the mail? Direct it to:

**Oklahoma Contem...
